name: The Last Dinosaur
description:
The Last Dinosaur is a game we created within three days for the "Three days until Xmas Jam!". The theme was "Let it snow!" and the limitation was "Monochrome colors".

You play as a cute dinosaur that needs to eat food in order to survive the cold weather. How long will you survive?

Coding: Julia Keppler
Art and Animation: Bastian Baier

Can you find the secret room?
